content.text:
# 1994 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation

The 1994 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation () was held in January 1995. It is part of the Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation series held in Hong Kong.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大勁歌金曲) of 1994 are as follows:
{|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;"
! Song name in Chinese
! Artist
|-
|  夢中人
|  Faye Wong
|-
|  鐵幕誘惑
|  Aaron Kwok
|-
|  讓我跟你走
|  Cass Phang
|-
|  我等到花兒也謝了
|  Jacky Cheung
|-
|  向全世界說愛你
|  Andy Hui
|-
|  女人的弱點
|  Sally Yeh
|-
|  終有一天感動你
|  Joyce Lee
|-
|  繾綣星光下
|  Shirley Kwan
|-
|  那有一天不想你
|  Leon Lai
|-
|  誰人知
|  Andy Lau
|-
|  心酸的情歌
|  Eric Moo
|-
|  昨晚你已嫁給誰
|  Wakin Chau
|-
|}
Additional awards
{|class="wikitable"
! Award
! Song name(if available for award)
! Recipient(s)
|-
| colspan=3 | The Best Duet Song Award ( 最受歡迎合唱歌曲獎)
|-
| style="background:#FFCC00; color:black" align=right | Gold award
|style="text-align: center;" |  從不喜歡孤單一個
| William So, Angela Pang (彭家麗)
|-
| style="background:#C0C0C0; color:black" align=right | Silver award
|style="text-align: center;" |  非一般愛火
| Andy Hui, Sammi Cheng
|-
| style="background:#CD7F32; color:black" align=right | Bronze award
|style="text-align: center;" |  愛情來的時候
| Eric Moo, Charlie Yeung
|-
| colspan=3 | The Most Popular Mandarin Song Award ( 最受歡迎國語歌曲獎 )
|-
| style="background:#FFCC00; color:black" align=right | Gold award
|style="text-align: center;" |  忘情水
| Andy Lau
|-
| style="background:#C0C0C0; color:black" align=right | Silver award
|style="text-align: center;" |  太傻
| Eric Moo
|-
| style="background:#CD7F32; color:black" align=right | Bronze award
|style="text-align: center;" |  用心良苦
| Phil Chang
|-
| The Best Composition Award( 最佳作曲獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  那有一天不想你
|
* Music composers: Mahmood Rumjahn
* Performed by: Leon Lai
|-
| The Best Lyric Award( 最佳填詞獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  繾綣星光下
|
* Lyrics by: Thomas Chow (周禮茂)
* Performed by: Shirley Kwan
|-
| The Best Music Arrangement Award( 最佳編曲獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  昨晚你已嫁給誰
|
* Music Arrangement by: Jimmy Chiang (江建民)
* Performed by: Wakin Chau
|-
| The Best Song Producer Award( 最佳歌曲監製獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  繾綣星光下
|
* Music producer: Joseph Ip (葉廣權)
* Performed by: Shirley Kwan
|-
| colspan=3 | The Next Generation Performance Award, Male singer ( 新一代傑出表現獎, 男歌手 )

| style="background:#FFCC00; color:black" align=right | Gold award
|style="text-align: center;" |  ---

|-

|style="text-align: center;" |  ---
| Ekin Cheng

|style="text-align: center;" |  ---

|-

|-

|style="text-align: center;" |  ---
| Vivian Chow
|-
| style="background:#CD7F32; color:black" align=right | Bronze award
|style="text-align: center;" |  ---

|-
| The Best Music Video Award( 最佳音樂錄影帶獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" | 怎麼天生不是女人
|
* Director 導演 : Zeng Xian Zong, Tsang Hin Chung (曾憲宗),
* Performed by: Grasshopper (Band members: Calvin Choy,Remus Choy, Edmond So)
|-
| The Best Music Video Performance Award( 最佳音樂錄影帶演出獎 )
|style="text-align: center;" |  希望
| Hacken Lee
|-
